\"Mars in the Mind of Man: A Panel Discussion\" is part of the Jet Propulsion Laboratory-sponsored von Karman Lecture Series, Thursday, March 16 at JPL, and Friday, March 17 at Pasadena City College. Both discussions begin at 7 p.m. Admission is free, and seating is on a first-come, first-served basis.


Date: 2000-03-10 21:03:00

[![NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory, California Institute of
Technology](http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/images/){width="100"
height="75"}](http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/news/&rn=news.xml&rst=4954)\
\
\"Mars in the Mind of Man: A Panel Discussion\" is part of the Jet
Propulsion Laboratory-sponsored von Karman Lecture Series, Thursday,
March 16 at JPL, and Friday, March 17 at Pasadena City College. Both
discussions begin at 7 p.m. Admission is free, and seating is on a
first-come, first-served basis.
